metadata.title: M3 Consultants | Human Resources Consulting Firm
metadata.description: Human resources consulting firm based in Abidjan. Expertise in HR consulting, recruitment, professional training, and intellectual property.

hero.title: We have the HR solutions
hero.subtitle: A specialized firm based in Abidjan, we support companies in their human capital development strategy.

philosophy.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection, we can catch Excellence.
philosophy.description: At M3 Consultants, excellence is not a goal — it is our daily standard.

services.heading: Our Areas of Expertise
services.subtitle: Tailored solutions to transform your human capital.

hr_consulting.title: HR Consulting
hr_consulting.description: HR strategy, performance management, social policies, and change management support.

recruitment.title: Recruitment
recruitment.description: Sourcing, screening, interviews, and psychometric testing to identify top talent.

training.title: Professional Training
training.description: Custom programs in leadership, personal development, and technical skills.

ip_consulting.title: Intellectual Property
ip_consulting.description: Asset valuation, patents, trademarks, and IP litigation support.

cta.heading: Let's transform your human capital together
cta.description: Ready to optimize your human resources? Our experts are here to develop solutions tailored to your challenges.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: A firm founded by professionals from major international corporations.

story.heading: Our Story
story.paragraph1: After a rich career in major international companies established in Côte d'Ivoire, we decided to create M3-CONSULTANTS, which began its activities in 2021, to listen to you, identify your needs and provide the optimal solution.
story.paragraph2: This is our commitment to serve you in the best compliance with current legislation, knowledge, practices, and established good governance.
story.paragraph3: The other members of the Firm are expert practitioners with many years of proven operational experience in their area of expertise. Some of them have actively participated in the development of legislative and regulatory texts and the minimum conventional salary scales currently in force in social matters. So, who better than us would know the spirit of these texts and could share them with you or apply them to your concerns?
story.paragraph4: It is this wealth of experience that is placed at your disposal to advise you, train you and support you in the operational and strategic management of your concerns and activities.
story.paragraph5: Committed to developing socially responsible solutions, our proposals always take into account maintaining a peaceful and productive climate in your companies; and in complete confidentiality*.
story.paragraph6: We are certain that you will be delighted with our collaboration.
story.footnote: *We refrain from revealing the identity of our clients, even as references. However, we certify that we have extensive, multidimensional experience in our areas of expertise.

expertise.title: Operational Expertise
expertise.description: A team of seasoned practitioners, drawing on their experience in international companies.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.description: An absolute commitment to discretion and the protection of our clients' information.

responsibility.title: Social Responsibility
responsibility.description: A strong commitment to sustainable development and positive community impact.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: The constant pursuit of quality in every mission we undertake.

2021.title: Foundation
2021.description: Creation of M3 Consultants in Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire.

2022.title: Growth
2022.description: Expansion of our services and consolidation of our partner network.

2023.title: Expansion
2023.description: Diversification of our offering with intellectual property expertise.

2024.title: Reach
2024.description: Strengthening our presence in the West African sub-region.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive and customized solutions for every dimension of your human resources.

hr_consulting.title: Human Resources Consulting
hr_consulting.description: We support companies in developing and implementing high-performing HR strategies aligned with their growth objectives.

sub_services.title: HR Strategy
sub_services.description: Development of a human resources strategy aligned with the company's overall objectives, including workforce planning, talent management and organizational structure optimization.

sub_services.title: Recruitment and Selection
sub_services.description: Assistance in attracting, selecting and hiring top talent, including job description development, recruitment process management and new employee onboarding.

sub_services.title: Training and Development
sub_services.description: Design and implementation of training and development programs to enhance employee skills, leadership management and career development.

sub_services.title: Performance Management
sub_services.description: Establishment of performance evaluation systems to measure employee effectiveness, set objectives and provide constructive feedback.

sub_services.title: Compensation and Benefits
sub_services.description: Development of competitive compensation structures and benefits programs to attract and retain talent.

sub_services.title: Labor Relations
sub_services.description: Advice on best practices in employee relations, conflict management, collective bargaining and legal compliance.

sub_services.title: Talent Management
sub_services.description: Identification, development and retention of key talent within the organization, including succession planning and career management.

sub_services.title: Diversity and Inclusion
sub_services.description: Development of strategies to promote an inclusive and diverse work environment, taking into account different cultures, genders and backgrounds.

sub_services.title: Change Management
sub_services.description: Supporting organizations through change processes, such as restructuring, mergers and acquisitions, ensuring effective communication and managing the human aspects of change.

sub_services.title: HR Audit and Compliance
sub_services.description: Conducting audits of HR practices and policies to ensure compliance with current laws and regulations and identify areas for improvement.

recruitment.title: Recruitment
recruitment.description: Our rigorous approach to recruitment ensures the identification and selection of talent that perfectly matches your needs.

sub_services.title: Needs Analysis
sub_services.description: Defining the skills, experience and qualifications required for the position to be filled.

sub_services.title: Sourcing
sub_services.description: Identifying and attracting potential candidates through various channels, such as professional social networks, candidate databases, job fairs, etc.

sub_services.title: Pre-screening
sub_services.description: Evaluating applications received to select those that best match the position criteria.

sub_services.title: Interviews
sub_services.description: Organizing and conducting interviews to assess candidates' skills, experience and motivation.

sub_services.title: Tests and Assessments
sub_services.description: Implementing psychometric, technical or personality tests to evaluate candidates' aptitudes.

sub_services.title: Reference Verification
sub_services.description: Checking the professional and academic backgrounds of selected candidates.

sub_services.title: Decision Support
sub_services.description: Providing advice and analysis to help the company choose the most appropriate candidate.

sub_services.title: Onboarding
sub_services.description: Supporting the organization in the onboarding process of the new employee to ensure a smooth transition.

training.title: Professional Training
training.description: Custom training programs to develop your teams' skills and support their growth.

sub_services.title: Training Needs Analysis
sub_services.description: Identifying areas for improvement in terms of skills and knowledge within the organization.

sub_services.title: Training Program Design
sub_services.description: Creating custom training modules tailored to the company's specific needs and strategic objectives.

sub_services.title: Training Delivery
sub_services.description: Organizing and facilitating training sessions, whether in-person, online or hybrid.

sub_services.title: Leadership Development
sub_services.description: Programs aimed at strengthening leadership and management skills for executives and team leaders.

sub_services.title: Soft Skills Training
sub_services.description: Courses focused on developing interpersonal skills, such as communication, time management, conflict resolution, etc.

sub_services.title: Monitoring and Evaluation
sub_services.description: Measuring the effectiveness of training programs through pre- and post-assessments, as well as participant feedback.

sub_services.title: Individual Development Plans
sub_services.description: Creating personalized plans for employee professional development, taking into account their career goals and business needs.

ip_consulting.title: Intellectual Property
ip_consulting.description: Specialized expertise to protect and enhance your intangible assets in an ever-changing regulatory environment.

sub_services.title: IP Valuation
sub_services.description: Analysis of all intangible assets of the company to assess their value, protection status and commercial potential.

sub_services.title: IP Strategy
sub_services.description: Development of an intellectual property strategy aligned with the company's business objectives, taking into account market risks and opportunities.

sub_services.title: Filing and Registration
sub_services.description: Assistance in preparing and filing patent, trademark, design and copyright applications, as well as managing registration procedures with national and international IP offices.

sub_services.title: IP Portfolio Management
sub_services.description: Monitoring and managing existing IP assets, including registration renewals, deadline monitoring and license management.

sub_services.title: Research and Monitoring
sub_services.description: Conducting prior art searches, patentability analyses, trademark monitoring and freedom-to-operate studies to assess counterfeiting and infringement risks.

sub_services.title: Defense and Litigation
sub_services.description: Advice and representation in IP litigation proceedings, including oppositions, counterfeiting actions and settlement negotiations.

sub_services.title: Agreements and Licenses
sub_services.description: Drafting and negotiating confidentiality agreements, technology transfers, IP licenses and other intellectual property-related contracts.

sub_services.title: IP Audit
sub_services.description: Conducting intellectual property audits to identify IP-related risks and opportunities in the context of mergers, acquisitions, investments or other business transactions.

sub_services.title: Training and Awareness
sub_services.description: Organizing training sessions to raise employee awareness of the importance of IP and train them in managing intangible assets.

sub_services.title: Monetization Strategy
sub_services.description: Helping identify IP monetization opportunities, including patent commercialization, licensing and strategic partnerships.

cta.heading: Have a specific need?
cta.description: Contact us to discuss your challenges and discover how our experts can support you.

hero.title: Our Team
hero.subtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to your success.

mao.name: Dr. MAR Mao
mao.title: Chief of Mission / Managing Partner
mao.bio: Doctor of Business Law (University of Toulouse), graduate of the DESCARTES program and holder of the UMOA Administrators Certificate, Dr. MAR Mao brings unique expertise in business law and human resources management.
credentials: Doctorate in Business Law — University of Toulouse

kader.name: MAR Mamadou-Kader
kader.title: Project Manager
kader.bio: Holder of a BBA in IT Management (University of Houston) and an AA (Howard Community College), MAR Mamadou-Kader combines technological skills with strategic vision.
credentials: BBA in IT Management — University of Houston

experts.title: Expert Network
experts.subtitle: One network, one strength
experts.description: M3 Consultants relies on a network of specialized experts and partner firms to handle large-scale missions with the highest quality of service.

post3.title: The Importance of Continuous Training
post3.excerpt: How investing in skills development can boost your team's productivity.
